projectGridLines.title: Software engineer
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Participate in the software development

? Develop an innovative, appealing, high-quality apps in a cross-functional

team

? Write clean, simple and well-tested code

Skill sets: Python, Java, or similar languages. Basic knowledge of deep

learning frameworks, such as TensorFlow or PyTorch.

Basic understanding of 3D point cloud processing, computer vision, and

machine learning

concepts.

Traits expectation:

Strong problem-solving skills and a logical mindset.

? Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

? Ability to adapt quickly to new challenges and technologies.

? Enthusiasm for exploring and contributing to the field of artificial

intelligence and 3D point

cloud classification.

? Demonstrated creativity and a proactive approach to learning.

Expected learning:

Specific courses required for project execution:

projectGridLines.title: RADS Algorithm Development and Improvement:-
projectGridLines.description:
Description: We are looking for a Passionate

Intern work with us on developing Tools and Code to automate the


derivation of various Road

Attributes and improve the quality of algorithms , environment and

pipelines. This forms the

basis of building and delivering Roads in the Entire UMap-WallE Pipeline.

Candidate would be

working in a Very Dynamic Env/Project where they would be exposed to

quite a few technical

intricacies at the same time and would end up working on Skills like Java,

AWS, Kafka and Fully

Automated GitLab DevOPS Pipelines.

Skill sets:

Inquisitive Engineer.

? Good at OOPS / Programming.

? Good in Technologies like Java and its related frameworks like Spring

? Ability to iterate on a solution with engineers and business analysts

? Familiarity with Git and CI/CD workflows

? Familiarity with AWS services, DEVOPS / Agile methodology

projectGridLines.title: Software development
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Participate in software development.

? Develop an innovative, appealing, high-quality consumer app in a cross-

functional team.

? Write clean, simple, and well-tested code.

? Proactively handle ambiguities with designers and product managers.

? Contribute ideas for new features and identify areas for improvement.

? Collaborate effectively in and across teams.

Skill sets:

Programming knowledge

? Good Understanding of Data Structures & Algorithms

? Knowledge of Testing Methodologies

Traits expectation:

Ability to think and work independently

? Willingness to learn and have a fail-fast mentality.
